title: Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Kayakers enjoy a spring day on the Namekagon River. NPS/Eret   Â    Fees No fees are charged for use of landings, campsites, and other facilities on federal lands within the boundary of the Riverway. Fees are charged at state parks and other private lands, including some landings. Contact us if you have questions. Passes America the Beautiful - the National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass   Only the access passes and US military passes are available at the Riverway and only at the St. Croix River Visitor Center. Wisconsin Interstate State Park is one of the nine Ice Age Scientific Reserve Units. Federal passes are valid for entry. Visit the America the Beautiful webpage to find out more about the passes and to purchase passes online.  Purchase passes nearby at the:   Mississippi River Visitor Center in the Science Museum of Minnesota. Hayward office of the Chequamegon-Nicolet National Forest at 10650 Nyman Avenue.   Fourth graders can obtain a free pass to visit any national park in 2016 as part of the Every Kid in a Park program.
